name: ML_Factory
description:
ML_Factory A bot’s journey

Hello everyone!!!  

This is our project for VR Jam 2022.

Devlog

We started with a simple blockout of the scene so we could begin with the basic code and interactions.

Then we modeled and textured all 3D assets and created some tile textures for walls, floors, and ceilings.

We imported the assets into unity and assembled the scene following the previous blockout.

And finally, we set up the lights and baked the scene.

We hope you will enjoy the game!

Credits

Davide Riccitiello         - Programmer
